did.unittitle: School of Dentistry (University of Michigan) Publications 1875-2011
did.abstract: The collection contains annual reports, brochures and pamphlets, bulletins and college catalogs, directories, histories, lectures, manuals, and newsletters such as the Alumni Bulletin, Alumni News, Dentalum, The Michigan Dental Explorer, Newsline and The Staff and Student Newsletter. Also included are publications from departments and other sub-units of the school, programs from the Honors Convocation, reports, and the student yearbook

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: Publications are received periodically from the unit.

accruals.p: Periodic additions to the records are expected.

accessrestrict.p: The School of Dentistry (University of Michigan) Publications are open for research without restriction.

userestrict.p: Copyright is held by the Regents of the University of Michigan.

prefercite.p: item, folder title, box no., School of Dentistry (University of Michigan) Publications, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: See the historic sketch in the finding aid for School of Dentistry (University of Michigan) finding aid.

scopecontent.p: The Publications of the School of Dentistry contains annual reports, brochures and pamphlets, bulletins and college catalogs, directories, histories, lectures, manuals, and newsletters such as the Alumni Bulletin, Alumni News, Dentalum, The Michigan Dental Explorer, Newsline and The Staff and Student Newsletter. Also includes publications of departments and other sub-units of the school, programs from the Honors Convocation, reports and the student yearbook. The Publications are divided into two series: Unit Publications and Sub-Unit Publications. Some publications (or their successors) may no longer be available in print but are available on the school s website.

scopecontent.p: Unit Publications include bulletins, staff directories, runs of the newsletters Alumni News, and Alumni Bulletin, whose title changed to DentalUM in 1990. The histories included in this record group are about the University of Michigan School of Dentistry, but were produced by other sources with the exception of A Compilation of Historical Data. Additionally, two of these histories are written in Spanish. Also included are annual reports for the years 1920-1978 and Yearbooks for the years 1966-1985.

scopecontent.p: Sub-Unit Publications consist of materials produced by units within the School of Dentistry. These include the Dental Society which produced the newsletter Dental Journal. The Department of Orthodontics publications include manuals and workbooks to accompany classes as well as annual reports and a case analysis of an orthodontic patient. The Development Office publications include brochures and the Honor Roll of Donors and Volunteers. The materials from the W. K. Kellogg Foundation Institute will be found in a separate record group. Other Sub-Units represented include Dental Hygiene, the Department of Educational Resources, the Department of Oral Biology, the Library, and the Postgraduate Division. The publications from these Sub-Units include primarily annual reports and brochures.
